profile.title: Yuzi Profil
profile.mustLogin: Yu fɔ sign in fɔ si di sεtin dem.
profile.disappearingMessages: Tɔn ɔn mɛsɛj we de disapya
profile.saveError: Ɛrɔ: Nɔ able sev di sɛtin
profile.noPrivateKey: Nɔ de eny privet ki pan dis divais fɔ eksport.
profile.setBackupPassword: Set paswɔd fɔ ɛnkrip yu backup:
profile.enterBackupPassword: Put di paswɔd fɔ dis backup:
profile.importSuccess: Privet ki dɔn import na dis divais.
profile.importFailed: Import fɔl (rɔŋ paswɔd ɔ file don bad).
profile.keysRotated: Nyu ki pɛn dɔn jenaret, public ki dɔn upload.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Yu privet ki nɔ de liv dis divais. Eksport wan we get paswɔd fɔ restor am pan nɔda divais.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Yu de pan Free—yus di kwik Sun/Moon opshɔn dɛn bɛlow. Upgrade fɔ opɔn mɔ tim dɛn.
profile.backupDesc: Mek backup we get paswɔd fɔ yu ki dem, ɛn restor am na nɔda divais fɔ sink.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Blɔ wɛn app nɔ de fokus
profile.notifyOnCopy: Tɛl mi wɛn sombɔdi kɔpi mi mɛsɛj
profile.followHint: Dɛn stɔri go sho na yu Fɔlowin fid if dɛn post am fɔ Followers ɔ Public.
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Sɔmtin rɔŋ bin apin na dis sɛkshɔn.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Fɔwod kɔl an tɛks we de kam na yu vɛrifay fɔn ɔ imel. Wɛn yu de kɔl/tɛks go, i fit sho yu Chatforia nɔmba.

chat.selectPrompt: Chuz wan tɛks ɔ chat rum fɔ stat chat
chat.emptySubtitle: Sɛnd wan mɛsɛj fɔ stat chat.

status.filesNote: Up to 5 file. 24h bifo i don.

sidebar.loginPrompt: Log in fɔ ɛdit yu sɛtin.

premium.heading: Go Premium
premium.description: Opɔn pawa fitchɔ dɛm & no ad dɛm.

auth.headline: Sikyu, global mɛsɛjin wit instɛnt tránslet
auth.description: End-to-end ɛnkripshɔn, AI tránslet, disapyarin mɛsɛj, an vɔis/videyo kɔl.

feature.privacy: Praivasi fɔs. Yu data na yu kontrol.

auth.desktopTip: Na desktop? Scan wit yu fɔn fɔ get di app.
auth.subhead: Praivit, ɛnkrip, an tránslet mɛsɛjin — instɛntli.
auth.tip: Yu fit yus Chatforia pan eni divais — ɔ download di app fɔ di best ekspiriɛns.
auth.scanHint: Scan fɔ download di app ɔ opɔn na yu brɔwza.

home.title: Hom
home.subheader: Sɛnd wan mɛsɛj fɔ stat chat.

press.title: Prɛs
press.contact: Fɔ media inkwairi dem, rik yu wi na press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Fɔ media inkwairi dem, rik yu wi na press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia na wan sikyɔ mɛsɛnja wit instɛnt tránslet an E2E ɛnkripshɔn, we dɔn dizayn fɔ mek global tɔk-tɔk praivit an isi.
press.assetsText: Logo, skrinshɔt, an prɔdɔkt imijri (de kam sun).

careers.title: Karia
careers.intro: Wi na smɔl tim we de bild wan praivit, global mɛsɛnja. If yu kɛa bɔt ɛnkripshɔn, aksesibiliti, an fayn UX, wi go glad fɔ yɛri fɔm yu.
careers.openRoles: Opɔn rɔl dɛm: Injiniarin (Ful-stak, iOS, Android), Prɔdɔkt, Sɔpɔt.
careers.apply: Aw fɔ apply: Sɛnd yu rizum/link dɛm go jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Abɔut Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia na wan sikyɔ, mɔtilingwa mɛsɛnja wit end-to-end ɛnkripshɔn, instɛnt tránslet, an vɔis/videyo kɔl. Di misɔn plɛn: ɛp pipul kɔnɛkt—sɛfli, praivitli, an kros llengwej.

values.control: Kontrol: Disapyarin mɛsɛj & rid risit na ɔpishɔn.

about.howDescription: Mɛsɛj dɛn de ɛnkrip na yu divais bifo dɛn go. Tránslet, backup, an divais sink dɔn dizayn fɔ minimais wetin wi sàva fit si.

advertise.title: Advatays wit Chatforia
advertise.description: Rish yusaz dɛn we de yus mɛsɛjin wit kɔrɛkt, brand-sef plɛsmɛnt. Wi get banà invɛntɔri na top spɔt dɛm, spɔnshɔp, an haus promo. Premium yusaz nɔ de si ad.

adsense.withPubId: Wit de yus Google AdSense fɔ ad dɛn. If yu wan tagɛt wi trù Google Ads, yus pɔblisha ID {{pubId}} an aks fɔ manɛj plɛsmɛnt pan di yunit dɛm bɛlow. Direkt spɔnshɔp dɛn de — yus di fɔm.
adsense.noPubId: Wit de yus Google AdSense fɔ ad dɛn. Direkt spɔnshɔp dɛn sef de — yus di fɔm bɛlow.

placement.acceptedSizes: Saiz dɛn we wi de aksept

advertise.noPlacements: Nɔ plɛsmɛnt nɔ set yet. Put dɛn na ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Yusaz dɛn de kam bɔku tem an de spend tɛm na chat UI
why.sponsoredMoments: Spɔnso momɛnt dɛn (lɛk “Stat a Chat” modal) de
why.deals: Direkt dil ɔ prɔgrɔmatik trù AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Tɛnki! Yu inkwairi dɔn kam. Wi go fɔlɔp shɔtli.
form.missingRequired: Put nem, imel, an mɛsɛj fɔs.
form.successToast: Tɛnki! Wi go rɛch yu sun.
form.mailtoInfo: Wi de opɔn yu imel klayent fɔ sɛnd di inkwairi…

legal.disclaimerStart: Wɛn yu sɔbmit, yu agrii wit wi

upgrade.title: Upgrade
upgrade.subtitle: Chuz di rait plan fɔ yu: go ad-frí wit Plus, ɔ get ɔl pawa fitchɔ wit Premium.

scheduleBanner.title: Sabskripshɔn go don
scheduleBanner.body: Yu go go bak to Free na

features.sameFeatures: Di sɛm fitchɔ dɛn lek Mɔntli

gettingStarted.title: Ɓegin Yus Am
gettingStarted.subtitle: Nyu to Chatforia? Dis kwik stat go shɔ yu di main tin dɛn so yu go stat wok kwik.

alert.text: Dis gaid go gro wɛn wi de lɔnch nyu fitchɔ. If sɔmtin nɔ de, tɛl wi trù

section2.title: 2) Stat mɛsɛjin
section2.item1: Mek DM ɔ Grup an sɛnd fɔs mɛsɛj.
section2.item2: Yus instɛnt tránslet fɔ chat kros 100+ llengwej.
section2.item3: Tri disapyarin mɛsɛj an rid risit na Profil → Praivasi.

section3.title: 3) Go fɔda
section3.item1Part2: pɛj (Plus = no ad, Premium = ful fitchɔ).
section3.item2Part1: Link mɔ divais an set Ɛnkrip backup na

account.q: Aw a go mek ɔ rɛkɔva mi akɔnt?
account.a: Download di app ɔ yus web, tap “Mek akɔnt”, vɛrifay yu imel/fɔn. Fɔ rɛkɔva, yus “Fɔgɛt paswɔd”.

privacy.a: Yɛs. Mɛsɛj an kɔl dɛn na end-to-end ɛnkrip bɛfɔ. Na onli yu an di pɛsin we yu de chat wit fit rid am.

translate.a: Tɔn ɔn “Auto-tránslet” na Sɛtin → Apierens & Langwej. Wɛ yus on-divais we de sɔpɔt am; if nɔ so, wit de yus sikyɔ API wit smɔ metadata.

contact.a: Rish wi na support@chatforia.com. Put skrinshɔt an yu app vɛshɔn.

contact.title: Kontak Wi
contact.successMsg: Tɛnki—wi tim go ripɔnd na imel.
contact.errorSend: Nɔ bin fɛn fɔ sɛnd. Plɛs imel support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Dis Praivasi Polisi xplɛn aw Chatforia (“wi”, “wi ɔl”) kɔlɛkt, yus, an shea infɔmɛshɔn wɛn yu de yus wi app an sɛvis. Wi dizayn Chatforia fɔ minimais di data we wi fit si.

infoWeCollect.title: Infɔmɛshɔn we wi de kɔlɛkt
infoWeCollect.account: Akɔnt infɔ (lek imel/fɔn) fɔ mek an sikyɔ yu akɔnt.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Ɛnkrip kɔntɛnt (mɛsɛj/kɔl) na end-to-end ɛnkrip; wi nɔ fit rid am.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Daignɔstik/iyus lek krash lɔg, divais tɛp, ɔ smɔ analiz fɔ impruv pɔfɔmans.

howWeUse.title: Aw wi de yus infɔmɛshɔn
howWeUse.provide: Gi an sikyɔ di sɛvis (ɔtɛntikɛshɔn, spam/abiu detɛkshɔn).

sharing.title: Shearin
sharing.body: Wi nɔ de sεl pɛsin datà. Wi fit shea smɔ datà wit prɔsɛsa dɛn (lek push notifikɛshɔn, analiz) anda strik kɔntrakt.

rights.title: Yu rait dɛm
rights.body: Dɛpɛn pan yu rigin (lek GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), yu fit rikwɛst aksɛs, kɔrɛkshɔn, dileshɔn, ɔ ɔpt-awt fɔ sɔntin prɔsɛsin. Kontak: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Data ritɛnshɔn & sikyɔrɛti
retention.body: Wi de kip onli wetin nɛsid fɔ rɔn di sɛvis an yus indɔstri-stanad sikyɔrɛti. E2E kɔntɛnt wi nɔ fit dɛkrip am.

children.title: Pikin dɛm
children.body: Chatforia nɔ fɔ pikin we nɔ rich 13 (ɔ as yu lɔ kal lɔ de tɔk).

changes.title: Chenj dɛm
changes.body: Wi go post ɔpdet ya an chenj di “Las ɔpdet” det.

intro.body: Wɛn yu de yus Chatforia, yu agrii wit dis Tɛms. If yu nɔ agrii, nɔ yus di sɛvis.

accounts.title: Akɔnt dɛm
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Gi kɔrɛkt infɔmɛshɔn an kip kɔd dɛm sef.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Yu na di rɛspɔnsibul pɔsin fɔ wetin apin pan yu akɔnt.

acceptableUse.title: Aksɛptabul Yus
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Nɔ yus iligal, abiusiv, ɔ infring kɔntɛnt; nɔ spam ɔ ɔtomɛtit abius.

yourContent.title: Yu kɔntɛnt
yourContent.body: Yu stil get rait pan yu kɔntɛnt. Yu gi wi di rait dɛn we nid fɔ rɔn di sɛvis (lek rutin, stɔrej, tránslet).

disclaimer.title: Disklɛmà & laya̱bíliti
disclaimer.body: Sɛvis de “as is” witɔut waranti. As di lɔ alaw, Chatforia nɔ gɛt laya̱bíliti fɔ indi rɛk ɔ konsikwɛns dɛm.

changes.title: Chenj dɛm
changes.body: Wi fit ɔpdet dis tɛms; if yu go stil yus am afta chenj, dat min se yu agrii.

doNotSell.title: Nɔ Sɛl ɔr Shea Mi Pɛsin Infɔmɛshɔn
doNotSell.body: Chatforia nɔ de sεl pɛsin infɔmɛshɔn. Kalifɔnia rizidɛnt dɛn stil fit sɔbmit rikwɛst anda CPRA wit di bɔtin bɛlow.

cookies.title: Kuki Sɛtin
cookies.body: Chatforia yus smɔ kuki dɛm (lek sεshɔn, sikyɔrɛti). Wi nɔ de yus tɔd pátí ad kuki. Manɛj kuki dɛn na yu brɔwza sɛtin.
